query.sql: SELECT CD_ARQ, NM_ARQ, LABEL, CD_UOR, DT_ATL, LINK, DCR FROM arqRedeDinop.tb_arquivos WHERE $where AND LABEL = '$label' ;

SELECT CD_ARQ, NM_ARQ, LABEL, CD_UOR, DT_ATL, LINK, DCR FROM arqRedeDinop.tb_arquivos WHERE CD_UOR IN (SELECT CD_UOR FROM mstNovo.depe_hrqo WHERE depe_hrqo.CD_UOR_HRQO = $where) AND LABEL = '$label' ;

SELECT a.CD_ARQ, a.NM_ARQ, a.LABEL, a.CD_UOR, a.DT_ATL, a.LINK, a.DCR FROM arqRedeDinop.tb_arquivos a INNER JOIN mstNovo.depe_hrqo_uf ON a.CD_UOR = depe_hrqo_uf.CD_UOR WHERE depe_hrqo_uf.SG_UF_UOR = '$where' AND a.LABEL = '$label' ;
SELECT UF, ENABLED FROM arqRedeDinop.tb_uor_uf WHERE tb_uor_uf.CD_UOR = $where ;
